rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with a traditional Chettinad archway and natural stone flooring.
Open living area integrated with indoor-outdoor space featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light.
Dining area adjacent to the living room with Vastu alignment ensuring east or north facing entrances.
Modern kitchen designed with traditional Chettinad accents and ample storage; placed in the southeast corner for positive energy flow.
Spacious master bedroom on the east side with floor-to-ceiling windows and a private balcony overlooking the garden.
Secondary bedroom located in the north-west quadrant for balance and privacy.
Third bedroom with south-east facing windows to harness positive Vastu energy.
Well-designed bathroom attached to the master bedroom.
Utility room for cleaning and maintenance placed adjacent to the kitchen.

openings.description: Traditional wooden door with intricate carvings.
Floor-to-ceiling window providing ample natural light and ventilation.
Door leading to an open patio area for food preparation and relaxation.

additional_features.description: A private gym equipped with modern fitness equipment and ample space for yoga.
Infinity edge swimming pool designed in a minimalist style, complementing the Chettinad aesthetic and Vastu principles.
Lush garden with native plants to enhance the natural ambience and ensure energy balance as per Vastu.
